description: Deploys a Seldon Core Model into the Fusion cluster

columnNames.description: A list of column names that the model generates which the ML Service will return after inference.
columnNames.title: Output column names for model

deployModelName.description: The model name of the Seldon Core deployment to deploy
deployModelName.title: Model name

id.description: The ID for this job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_)
id.title: Job ID

modelDockerImage.description: Name of the model's docker image
modelDockerImage.title: Image name

modelDockerRepo.description: Defines the Docker repository where the model image is located.
modelDockerRepo.title: Docker repository

modelDockerSecret.description: Defines the Kubernetes secret to be used with the Docker repository
modelDockerSecret.title: Kubernetes secret name for model repo

modelReplicas.description: How many replicas of the model should be deployed by Seldon Core
modelReplicas.title: Model replicas

sparkConfig.description: Provide additional key/value pairs to be injected into the training JSON map at runtime. Values will be inserted as-is, so use " to surround string values
sparkConfig.title: Additional parameters
